ToolTips.note: Description/min, max, and default values/special behavior (increment amounts, etc), list of options for option lists?

Parameter.name: Data2asCV
Parameter.tooltip: Data 2 Knob CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeACV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade A CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeAWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade A Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: XfadeBCV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade B CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeBWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade B Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: XfadeCCV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade C CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeCWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade C Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: XfadeDCV
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade D CV Assignment, 1A - 8C, Default Off, No Relative Assignments (0A, 0B, OC)

Parameter.name: XfadeDWidth
Parameter.tooltip: Crossfade D Width, Sets How Quickly the Fade Happens, 0.01 - 10.00, Default 1.0

Parameter.name: AttackFromCurrent
Parameter.tooltip: Start Attack from Zero or from Current Value, May Eliminate Clicks

Parameter.name: AutoTrigger
Parameter.tooltip: When Selecting New Preset - Wait for Trigger to Play or Start Playing Immediately

Parameter.name: ChannelMode
Parameter.tooltip: Channel Mode, Master - Used to Indicate a Normal Mono or Left Stereo Channel, Link - Will Play When Master Layer Above is Triggered, Stereo/Right - Companion Channel to Stereo Master, Cycle - Samples Play Sequentially on Each Trigger

Parameter.name: LoopMode
Parameter.tooltip: Loop Mode, No Loop, Loop, Loop and Release
